guide.body: Start creating transaction links with Cashier: create & airdrop NFTs, and more features coming!

home.noLinksFoundDescription: You haven't created any links yet.

validation.action_failed_message: Your links is not valid. Please check again.

confirm_popup.title: Confirm transaction
confirm_popup.legal_text: By confirming you agree to execute the transaction above and agree to the terms of service

info.title: Info on fees
info.cashier_fee_text: Cashier charges a modest fee for creating links. The fees help us operate and improve Cashier.
network_fee_text: Network fees are charged by the blockchains, not by Cashier, as a payment to transfer assets on the blockchain. Cashier collects network fees to facilitate these transfer payments.
When an asset is sent to the link, network fee is charged. The amount may depends on the blockchain.

When an asset is received from the link, network fee is charged. Cashier pre-emptively collects these network fees from the link creator, so that the receiver does not have to pay a network fee to receive assets from the link.

common.commonErrorMessage: There was a error while creating the link. Please try again later.
common.creatingLink: The link is being created. Please wait for seconds.
